title: Amazon | SDE-1 (L4) | Hyderabad
content:
**Education**: BE in Computer Engineering (Tier 3 College)
**YOE**: 8 months
**Prev Exp:** Software Engineer at Accenture
**Date of the Offer:** 3rd March 2022
**Company:** Amazon
**Title/Level:** Software Development Engineer (L4)
**Location:** Hyderabad, India
**Salary:** ₹20,00,000
**Relocation Bonus:** *Option A)* ₹1,50,000 or *Option B)*  Amazon arranges everything for you.
**Signing Bonus:** ₹5,25,000 (1st Yr) +  2,90,000 (2nd Yr)
**Stock bonus:** 5 RSU vested over 4 years (5% 1st yr, 15% 2nd yr, 20% every 6 months thereafter)
**Total comp (Salary + Bonus):** ₹25,25,000 in First year
**Benefits:** Standard Amazon Benefits
**Other details:** Did not negotiate because I was expecting the 2021 graduate standard offer of 18 LPA.
**Previous CTC:** ₹6,50,000


Will post my interview experience soon. Leetcode has helped me throughout, now it is my time to give it back to the community.

title: Amazon vs Arcesium (New Grad Offer)
content:
Education: Bachelors in CS from tier 1 college
Years of Experience: 0 (fresher)
Prior Experience: Interned at Arcesium
Date of the Offer: 2022

Company: Amazon
Title/Level: sde 1
Location: India
Salary: INR 15,50,000
Relocation: INR 1,50,000
Signing Bonus: INR 9,50,000(first year) + INR6,00,000(second year)
Stock bonus: ~INR 13,00,000(5%,15%,40%,40%)
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): ~INR 26,00,000

Company: Arcesium (D.E. Shaw spinoff)
Title/Level: sde 1
Location: India
Salary: INR 20,50,000
Signing Bonus: INR 2,50,000
Retension bonus (LTI): INR 12,00,000(25%,25%,25%,25%) (it is a cash component)
Bonus: INR 3,00,000(fixed)
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): ~INR 28,00,000

Priorities : Want good work but also a decent/good wlb. 

Other Details : As per my current research, Amazon will provide better work and brand-name with bad wlb. Also heard not so positive things about it's PIP culture. Arcesium will provide better perks(free food,etc), decent wlb, better salary increments but not so good brand name and work.

Which one to choose and what are your thoughts about choosing Arcesium for better salary and increments and then after 1.5yr-2yr trying for sde2 at Amazon?

Joining Bonus - 2 Lac (1 (Current year) + 1 (Next year))
Total comp (Base + Bonus + Stock ) - 49.5 Lac (Total Direct Compensation) --> 44.5 Lac (First Year)
Benefits: Walmart Standard Benefits

Need suggestions on the offered amount - Is base package low as per market standards And Walmart doesn't want to negotiate on it (HR said we need to maintain a parity among employees)

Other Offer -

Date of the Offer - 02 Mar 2022
Company - DP World
Title/Level - SDE 2
Location: Gurugram

Base Pay - 42.4 Lac
Variable Pay - 10.6 Lac
RSU - No
Joining Bonus - No
Total comp (Base + Bonus + Stock ) - 53 Lac
Benefits - DP World Standard Benefits

Please provide suggestion like Work Culture, Work Life Balance, Growth Opportunities in both companies.

title: Amazon | SDE-1 | Hyderabad (India)
content:
Education: B.Tech (Computer Science) 3 tier College (India) 2021 Grad
Years of Experience: 6 months(Full time experience) + 6 months(Internship experience)
Prior Experience: Software Engineer at NCR Corporation
Date of the Offer: March 2022
Company: Amazon (Off-Campus)
Title/Level: Software Development Engineer-1 (SDE-1)
Location: Hyderabad
Prevoius Salary : 10L (Fixed including Gratuity)
Base : 15.5L
Signing Bonus: 9.5L (1st year sign on bonus) + 6L (2nd year sign on bonus)
Relocation: 1.5L (It won't be provided to me as currently I am in hyderabad)
Stocks : 1314713L (Vesting period 5%, 15%, 40%, 40%)
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): 25L ( 15.5L + 9.5L) for 1st year.

**Stocks won't be vested in the 1st year. I will start to get the stocks after the completion of the 2nd year onwards.**

Recruiter didn't negotiated. He was not interested to know whether I have any competing offer(I had one from meesho link is given below) or not. He simply just gave me this offer without listening about my counter offer or expected salary. I tried to negotiate but that didn't worked out.

Competing Offer :
https://leetcode.com/discuss/compensation/1742799/Meesho-or-SDE-1-or-Bangalore



**If I want to join meesho. Can I negotiate with them with this offer even if I have already accpeted the offer. Meesho gave me 21.15L but for freshers 2022 grad from premium colleges they are giving 26.5L**
